>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Comment Division

id:: td-000002

######################################################################

This SML document contains a comment division.

###COMMENT

>>>problem

title:: Commented-Out Problem

id:: commented-problem-1

description:: This is a problem region inside a comment division.  The
purpose of putting this `problem' inside a comment is to test that the
parser handles this scenario properly.

<<<problem

This is the first line of content of a comment division.

This is the second line of content of a comment division.

###COMMENT

<<<DOCUMENT
